reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Plume Veil RDA; dual parallel @ .35Î©; cotton wicks; 45W

**Testing:** CAP Golden Pineapple @ 4%; Aged: 2 days

**Flavor description:** Sweet pineapple taste with a bit of added sugar and a touch of subtle tartness.  More of a canned pineapple taste.

**Off-flavors:**  Slight notes of oranges, but not unpleasant.  

**Throat hit:** 7/10. 

**Uses:**  Great for summertime mixes.  3-5% as a top note or in smaller percentages (0.5-2%) as an accent to other fruits.  A must have for a Pina Colada recipe.

**Pairings:** Citrus fruits, tropical fruits, coconut, light creams or vanillas.  

**Notes:**   A bit more robust than INW Pineapple, but a little less authentic.  I use it with INW to make a more rounded pineapple taste.  Ratios can vary depending on what you're after.

EDIT: [Link to all of our flavor reviews in the wiki](https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/wiki/index/flavor_reviews)
reviewsJson.author: wh1skeyk1ng
reviewsJson.title: Golden Pineapple
